title: Unleash Kayn's Carnage to Earn 2 Special Icons

replies.body:
not to mention play him 5 times in a row, of which everyone else will wish too...
why make this so annoying riot, I get it though, but barely anyone will be able to get it, why not just make it worth rp, even if not many people buy rp.
"Play 5 games as, WITH, or AGAINST" so it doesn't matter if they want to play him.
but look at the other objectives of the missions. You still need to be playing Kayn (buy him) to complete them. Did you read this or skim over it?

Of course you need to buy him, it's a limited edition icon, there are plenty of other icons you can buy with RP and IP.

The missions have a 4 week duration. If you can't win 1 game or get a double kill with Kayn in a month's time, then maybe you don't deserve to have the icon? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
good job stealing the entire blade design from Soul Eater.
Ok first of all, Soul Calibur 3, Zasalamel, Sould Edge, it's from 2005. Second, screw the scythe, this is going to induce insta-lock in like, every single game.
Coz its not like the idea of a red scythe is completely original right?
stop making these icons only for PvP, some other people like myself do not have the time to play and only play coop vs ai
i have 5 and 5 so i played kayn to win as kayn as part of the missions .i won a game but its not showing up as completed mission wtf
Have they posted the mission in the mission log or does that appear when you buy Kayn?
It appears when you buy Kayn (in the mission log.)
Do playing with and against a specific form in one game count as two?

"Play 5 games as, with, or against" NOT "verse or play with 5 kayn's" 
so no minimum you can get a specific icon would be 5 games.
looks like gender bender Kayn in my opinion for the skin. Guess they wanted to continue from the gender bender ez skin (tpa ez)
Really i half to get Kayn he is 7800 is this limted or know for the shadow i half to buy a skin{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{champion:141}}
